about_the_game:
Interested?

Try out the free prologue to get an early access trial of the game

Features

What is 1 Screen Platformer 2?
  • A game where you can jump, run, double jump, roll, and flip..
  • A game where you jump over stuff and onto platforms.
  • A game where you have to get to the end as fast as you can.
  • A game where you die a lot.
  • A game with 8 playable characters.
  • A game with 100 achievements.

Navigate the ship


After stealing the skull of an elder god in 1 Screen Platformer, Nadia Stormhammer returns to her orbiting space craft. The craft is empty. Self defense systems are on high alert. Something is not right.

Get from the teleportation room to the bridge in time to diagnose the problem, regroup with the crew, and get home.

4-times the game!


The sequel to 1 Screen Platformer is bigger in every way. Here is how it compares to the original.

Size:
1SP 1 is 960 x 540px in size
1SP 2 is 1920x1080px in size
If you are doing the math, you will know that it is an extra 1,555,200 pixels for you to explore. That is a good deal if you ask me.

Characters:
1SP 1: 5 Playable characters
1SP 2: 8 Playable characters

Level design:
1SP 1: Level is static with little change between characters
1SP 2: 8 Playable characters where each level is drastically different.

Achievements:
1SP 1: 90
1SP 2: 100

Ok I know it would make sense for me to have 400 achievements for this game. But Valve only lets me have 100 achievements for my game. I don't make the rules I just follow them. I don't know, talk to Gaben about this one.

Compete for the fastest time


You new to speedrunning and looking for a smaller game to practice your craft? 1 Screen Platformer is great for that. There are many ways to compete and run times are less than 30 minutes.

The game also features leaderboards to keep track of your times.

short_description: Try, die, retry in this challenging but fair precision platformer that takes place on 1 screen. Ultra tight controls, dozens of traps, 8 playable characters each with a unique gameplay style. Great for speedrunning, and 100% completionists. Also, no water levels!
